title: Malzahar q visual effect never plays properly even while on max settings
body:
In the above clip you can see the effect play out properly and after the call of the void closes there is void energy that releases. This effect has no real impact on the game, however I have played A LOT of malzahar so it's really disappointing since I have looked a few times on what the issue was and with no luck or results I have 80k mastery on him.  Now he is getting updated and whatnot its still no different for me, the q special effect doesn't play on either my live or pbe account. Perhaps an issue with amd cards?? I would really love to know.

EDIT: The title should specify "EVEN while on max settings" as in, even with everything maxed it wont play the effect.


EDIT: http://pastebin.ca/3583405 my dxdiag

replies.body:
FTFY. 

I'm going to pass this along to the team to take a look at. :) Thanks for the report!
Thanks so much! You're that famous person from twitter! :)
Not famous, I just hang around the community a lot. :D
IK I'm just tooting your horn :P i dont think i've ever said that phrase... Thank you for the help :)

^-^ 

Okie, caught up with some peeps and they took a look and it seems like you may need to repair/reinstall your client, as a file may have gotten jumbled somewhere along the road. 

If you're still having issues after that, hit me up again. :)
So how do I post the dxdiag?
The DxDiag can be attached to your post by dragging the file into the box, it should automatically attach to the bottom of your forum post.

Dragging and dropping it anywhere (even in the text box for the main post simply opens the txt or xml file in my browser/I have both a txt version and an xml one if it matters). I dont think the board supports file uploads.
You may have to upload to another site and drop the link here, similarly to how you would link an image from Imgur.

Sorry for not thinking of that myself, feel kinda dumb. Oh well, it is at the bottom of the post now in a link to a file upload site, will I know if they figure out what is up? IK other people have the issue as well because not every gameplay video has the effect play I cant ask everyone individually either xD. Thx for your help katey :)
Glad to help! We'll take a look at your DxDiag and see if anything may be funky there. Have you tried taking a look at this recently - within the last day or two?
Other than pc specs I'm not sure what there would be to look for, didn't notify me of any issues when i opened it up.

Yeah, this is a weird one. 

My fraaand over on champion update is going to take a look at this tomorrow and we can let you know what the verdict is. :)

Hey, sorry! 

I've been out of office for a bit. This doesn't appear to be something the team is able to reproduce. Are you seeing this on live currently?
Should I continue keeping this tab open?
Seems to be complicated :/
Alrighty, looking forward :)

I did that a few weeks ago, perhaps there is more than one download link?? I didn't try the repair tool though, what i did last time was delete everything in the folder and redownload. I'll try repair after I get out of game.

The tool is available in the client. 

When you load the client, before you login, there is a gear in the upper right corner that should allow you to do a repair. Looks like from your other comment it didn't work. D:
It did not work :/
This is actually a known issue! In the future, please create a separate bug report, as opposed to piggybacking on another. :) Helps us better track issues!
